password_reset_link_expired_message: Your password link has expired. Please request a new password reset email.
forgot_password_active_message: Enter your email address below and we will send you a confirmation email with a link to reset your password.
password_reset_invalid_password: Passwords must have at least 8 characters and contain all of the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
forgot_password_inactive_message: This account is inactive. For your security, please enter your email address below and we will send you an email with a link to reset your password.
reset_password_is_account_cleared_messag: For security purposes, all stored credit cards and address book information have been deleted from your account due to inactivity.
forgot_password_migrated_message: We'''re excited to announce some new changes to our website. In order to ensure that your personal information is kept safe, please help us by resetting your password. Enter your email address below and we will send you an email with a link to reset your password.

success_reset_password_message: Thank You! You have successfully saved your new password.
